PageTitle: display bgp vpnv4 routing-table statistics(Attribute Filter)
FuncDef: The display bgp vpnv4 routing-table statistics command displays statistics about BGP VPNv4 routes and BGP VPN routes based on specified multiple attribute filters. The display bgp vpnv4 routing-table statistics command displays statistics about BGP VPNv4 routes and BGP VPN routes based on specified multiple attribute filters.
CLIs: display bgp vpnv4 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tablestatisticsas-path-filter { <as-path-filter-num> | <as-path-filter-name> }

display bgp vpnv4 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tablestatisticscommunity-filter { { <community-filter-num> | <community-filter-numEx> | <community-filter-name> } | { <community-filter-num> | <community-filter-name> } whole-match }
display bgp vpnv4 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tablestatisticslarge-community-filter <largeComFilName> [ whole-match ]
display bgp instance <bgpName> vpnv4 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tablestatisticsas-path-filter { <as-path-filter-num> | <as-path-filter-name> }

display bgp instance <bgpName> vpnv4 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tablestatisticscommunity-filter { { <community-filter-num> | <community-filter-numEx> | <community-filter-name> } | { <community-filter-num> | <community-filter-name> } whole-match }
display bgp instance <bgpName> vpnv4 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tablestatisticslarge-community-filter <largeComFilName> [ whole-match ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays BGP VPNv4 routes and BGP routes of VPN instances.
-

Displays about the BGP routes of a specified VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Specifies the number of an AS_Path filter.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 256.

Specifies the name of an AS_Path filter.
The value is a string of 1 to 51 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the name of a community filter.
The value is a string of 1 to 51 case-sensitive characters. The string cannot be all digits.

Specifies the number of a basic community filter.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 99.

Specifies the number of an advanced community filter.
The value is an integer that ranges from 100 to 199.

Indicates that the Large-Community attribute is fully matched.
-

Specifies the name of a Large community filter.
The value is a string of 1 to 51 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies a BGP multi-instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp instance a vpnv4 all routing-table statistics as-path-filter pas
<HUAWEI> display bgp vpnv4 vpn-instance vrf routing-table statistics large-community-filter aaa
<HUAWEI> display bgp vpnv4 all routing-table statistics large-community-filter aaa whole-match
<HUAWEI> display bgp vpnv4 all routing-table statistics community-filter 10
